title: Smart Data Models - Solar Energy
description: A Data Model for Solar Energy generation.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be SolarEnergy

totalActivePower.description: Property. Total active power consumed by all phases.

phaseCurrent.description: Property. Current per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

reactivePower.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Units:'volts-ampere-reactive (VAr)'. Fundamental frequency reactive power. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties whose names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

voltage.description: Property. The value of Voltage in the entity corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Units:'-1 to +1'. Power factor for each phase. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

current.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Units:'Ampers (A)'. Electrical current. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase and the neutral wire: L1, L2, L3 and N.

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Total reactive power for all phases.

phaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Units:'Volts (V)'. The voltage between each phase and neutral conductor. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

activePower.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Units:'watt (W)'.Active power consumed per phase. The actual values will beconveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

dataDescriptor.description: Relationship. URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity

energyGenerated.description: Property. Energy generated over a specific time range from the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

maxSolarPowerMeasure.description: Property. A measure of maximum solar energy that can be generated.

frequency.description: Property. Frequency observed from the entity corresponding to this observation.

totalEnergyGenerated.description: Property. Total energy generated by the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Last reported time of observation.
